import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import * as BooksAPI from '../BooksAPI'; const Book = (props) => { const [bookList, setBookList] = useState([]); useEffect(() =>{ const loadBooks = async () =>{ const res = await BooksAPI.getAll(); setBookList(res); }; loadBooks(); }, []); const changeShelf = async (book, shelf) =>{ const res = await BooksAPI.update(book, shelf); const res2 = await BooksAPI.getAll(); setBookList(res2); } return (

Currently Reading

    {bookList.map((book, index) => { if(book.shelf === "currentlyReading"){ return(
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ) } })}

Want To Read

    {bookList.map((book, index) => { if(book.shelf === "wantToRead"){ return(
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ) } })}

Read

    {bookList.map((book, index) => { if(book.shelf === "read"){ return(
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ) } })}
); } export default Book;
